meanings.sent1: My mother takes care of me every day.
meanings.sent2: The mother bird built a nest for her eggs.
meanings.sent3: The mother cat looked after her kittens with love.
meanings.sent4: Nature is like a mother, providing for all living things.
meanings.sent5: The mother's love is unconditional and nurturing.

meanings.definition: To give birth to; to create or produce.
meanings.sent1: The tree will mother new leaves in the spring.
meanings.sent2: She will mother a beautiful painting with her talent.
meanings.sent3: The chef will mother a delicious cake for the party.
meanings.sent4: The sun will mother warmth and light for the earth.
meanings.sent5: Her creativity will mother amazing stories for children.
